name: Aerohills
overview:
Aerohills - is international company and it’s main activities are focused on the Development of casual games and games for social networks - full cycle of video games development.

Company has released a number of products: Casual adventure games under Funlinker brand name: https://www.facebook.com/Aerohills https://www.facebook.com/pages/Funlinker/107466115942465

Three musketeers secrets Celtic Lore Pride and Prejudice Cases of stolen beauty Mystery of The Earl, Office Life: IPO, Alice: English in Wonderland, Chukcha in the Big City

Team also took part as development partner in various projects for the world’s largest game publishers - «The Witcher» (CD Project RED), «Gothic 4 / Arcania » (Spellbound/JooWood), «Venetica» (Deck13), «Art of Murder» (City Interactive), «Desciples 3» (Dat Games/Akella), «Dungeon Lords “ Dream Catcher» (DC Interactive), «M&M’s: Lost formula» (Simon&Shuster Interactive N&Y), projects for ATARI, Heuristic Park, Noviy Disk, 1C, Buka, MediaHouse and many others.
